Sentencas: Solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells (SO-DCFCs) offer a promising way to convert common carbon materials such as coal and biomass to electricity efficiently.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: It is inevitable that these carbon fuels decompose during SO-DCFCs operation and release pyrolysis gases, which may affect the cell performance and change the anode reaction pathway.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, three coals and an activated carbon are used to investigate the role of pyrolysis gases in SO-DCFCs.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell polarization curve and durability performance are measured for all raw fuels and a pyrolysis pretreated coal at temperatures ranging from 1023 to 1123 K. Mass spectrometry is employed to analyze pyrolysis gases under open circuit operation.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that all raw fuels have good electrochemical performance at 1123 K.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell power density is greatly improved by the presence of pyrolysis gases (mainly H-2 and CO) in the anode chamber.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: And the cell durability performance is largely dependent on both the amounts of active pyrolysis gases and the carbon gasification reactivity.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: It is demonstrated that the dominant electrochemical reactions are the electrooxidation of gaseous fuels, namely pyrolysis gases in the initial stage of discharge, then CO produced by carbon gasification.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: The direct electrooxidation of carbon is less significant than that of gaseous fuels.
Titulo: Effect of coal based pyrolysis gases on the performance of solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells
